mapper.select: select count(*) from B where B_STATUS = 'P'

SELECT B_NO as "no", B_TITLE AS "title", B_UID AS "id", B_REGDATE as "regdate", B_VIEWS as "views", B_STATUS as "status" , B_RECOMMENDS as "recommends", "replyCnt" as "amount" FROM ( SELECT (RANK() OVER(ORDER BY B_NO DESC))ROWNUMS, BOARD_LIST.* FROM BOARD_LIST WHERE B_STATUS = 'P' ORDER BY B_NO DESC)
WHERE ROWNUMS > ((#{page}-1)*#{amount}) and ROWNUMS <= (#{page}*#{amount})

select B_NO as "no", B_CATEGORY as "category", B_REGDATE as "regdate", B_UID AS "id", B_TAG as "tag", B_TITLE as "title", B_CONTENTS as "contents", B_VIEWS as "views", B_RECOMMENDS as "recommends", B_ATTACHMENT as "attachment" from b where B_NO = #{no} AND B_STATUS !='N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO B( B_NO, B_CATEGORY, B_TAG, B_TITLE, B_CONTENTS, B_UID, B_STATUS, B_ATTACHMENT ) VALUES( #{no}, #{category}, #{tag}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{id}, #{status}, #{attachment} )
mapper.update: UPDATE B SET B_CATEGORY = #{category}, B_TAG = #{tag}, B_TITLE = #{title}, B_CONTENTS = #{contents}, B_STATUS = #{status}, B_ATTACHMENT = #{attachment} WHERE B_UID = #{id} AND B_NO = #{no} AND B_STATUS != 'N'
mapper.select: select CA_CODE AS "code", CA_NAME AS "name", CA_PERMISSION AS "permission" from CA
UPDATE B SET B_VIEWS = B_VIEWS + 1 WHERE B_NO = #{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE B SET B_RECOMMENDS = B_RECOMMENDS +(#{div}) WHERE B_NO = #{no}
